Uses of Class
de.ralleytn.simple.image.ConvolutionFilter

    • Uses of ConvolutionFilter in de.ralleytn.simple.image

      Subclasses of ConvolutionFilter in de.ralleytn.simple.image 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BoxBlurFilter
      A box blur, (also known as a box linear filter) is a spatial domain linear filter in which each pixel in the resulting image has a value equal to the average value of its neighboring pixels in the input image.
      class  EdgeDetectionFilter
      Filter that uses the following convolution matrix: -1.0F -1.0F -1.0F -1.0F 8.0F -1.0F -1.0F -1.0F -1.0F
      class  EmbossFilter
      Filter that uses the following convolution matrix: -2.0F -1.0F 0.0F -1.0F 1.0F 1.0F 0.0F 1.0F 2.0F
      class  GaussianBlurFilter
      Filter that blurs the image with gaussian blur.
      class  SharpenFilter
      Filter that uses the following convolution matrix: 0.0F -1.0F 0.0F -1.0F 5.0F -1.0F 0.0F -1.0F 0.0F
